Com_Photo_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Think_01>The <clr:0000>Ancient Columns<clr:ffff> are on the mountain
across the Tabantha Great Bridge
out front.
<sp:3:0:2:0101>And I imagine a painting of those columns
basking in a majestic <clr:0000>sunrise<clr:ffff> would
make our customers very happy.
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sigh_01>But I've given up on painting it myself now
that I've seen how terrifying the monsters
on that mountain can be.
Com_Photo_Thank:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_01>Thanks to you, Link, I could finally display
the painting I had given up on.<sp:0:4:0>The sight of our region's <clr:0000>Ancient Columns
lit by the sunrise<clr:ffff> will very likely—<sp:5:0:0>no, will
SURELY—delight our customers!
Com_Photo_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_01>Huh?<sp:5:0:0> Did you bring me <clr:0000>a picture of the
Ancient Columns in the sunrise<clr:ffff>?!
DoNotWakka_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:Greeting_01>Oh! You've noticed our new decoration!<sp:0:4:0>Someone from the Stable Association
brought it in the other day. These ring
garlands are very "in" right now.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>They come straight from <clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff>
in Necluda, east of Central Hyrule.
They're a local specialty, or so I'm told.
BurnedWakka_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting_01>Please be careful with our garland. If you
want your own, you can buy one in
<clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff>.
The village is in <clr:0000>Necluda<clr:ffff>, far southeast of
us.<sp:5:0:0> Given your clear enthusiasm, though,
it might be worth the trip.
Com_Photo_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>So long as you have a <clr:0000>picture<clr:ffff>,<sp:5:0:0> I can paint
a copy of it in two shakes of a horse's tail.
DoNotWakka_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_01>Hahaha! I see our ring garland has really
caught your fancy.<sp:0:4:0>I can't give it to you, but if you'd like to
buy your own, I recommend you pay a
visit to <clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>It's quite a ways to travel, but it's located
in <clr:0000>Necluda<clr:ffff> to the southeast of here.
Com_Photo_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>If <sp:5:0:0>you happen to have <clr:0000>a picture of the
Ancient Columns at sunrise<clr:ffff>, please
show it to me!
Com_Photo_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Admiration_01>It's miraculous that such an old ruin has
remained so well-preserved.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>If you have a picture—any picture—of the
<clr:0000>Ancient Columns at sunrise<clr:ffff>, I'll paint a
copy and display it.
So if you ever want to update the decor
around here, simply show me a picture,<sp:5:0:0>
and it will be done.
Com_Photo_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>When I look at this picture, I think about
gathering up my family one day to take a
look at the real thing.
<snd:Sigh_01>There's no way we could close the stable
to do so, of course, but...<sp:5:0:0>that only makes
me more grateful for your kindness.
Goodbye_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_00>Ah, that's right. If you do intend to go
<clr:0000>north<clr:ffff> to <clr:0000>Hebra<clr:ffff>...<sp:0:4:0>I recommend that you <clr:0000>take precautions
against the cold<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01><clr:0000>Hebra <clr:ffff>has always been a chilly region, but
ever since their recent <clr:0000>extreme cold snap<clr:ffff>,
they don't even have enough to eat.
You may see a Rito visitor here named
<clr:0000>Bedoli<clr:ffff>. She's come from <clr:0000>Rito Village <clr:ffff>to
stock up on food.
Com_Photo_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Admiration_01>This wall is where I would display my
painting of the <clr:0000>Ancient Columns bathed in
the light of the sunrise<clr:ffff>...if only I had one!
Imagine how pleased our customers would
be to gaze at a sight like that!
9007: I like it as it is.
Goodbye_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Chat_01>The<clr:0000> massive cold snap <clr:ffff>is over, and things
have finally settled down around here.<sp:0:4:0>But there's no shortage of strange
happenings these days. Please take
care during your travels.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Our employee <clr:0000>Banji <clr:ffff>really knows this area,
so don't be shy about asking for her help.
10001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Link, I'm sorry you came all this way, but
it seems now is not the time for resting...

Please visit when you have more time!
Goodbye_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_00>Ah, that's right. If you do intend to go
<clr:0000>north<clr:ffff> to <clr:0000>Hebra<clr:ffff>...<sp:0:4:0>I recommend that you <clr:0000>take precautions
against the cold<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01><clr:0000>Hebra <clr:ffff>has always been a chilly region, but
ever since their recent <clr:0000>extreme cold snap<clr:ffff>,
they don't even have enough to eat.
That Rito outside, <clr:0000>Bedoli<clr:ffff>, actually came
down here from <clr:0000>Rito Village <clr:ffff>to stock up
on food.
Com_Photo_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Trouble_01>It really is an evocative painting. I feel as
though the past comes to life every time
I look at it.
Com_Photo_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh,<sp:5:0:0> did you have something to say about
the <clr:0000>picture of the Ancient Columns<clr:ffff>?
Com_FirstTime_Only01:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Without further ado, to commemorate
your first use of Tabantha Bridge Stable...
Com_FirstTime_Only02:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Not only is this your first time using
Tabantha Bridge Stable, you've even
<clr:0000>registered a horse<clr:ffff>! So...
Com_Photo_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>If you cross the Tabantha Great Bridge
around the corner from our stable, you'll
see ruins on the mountain.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I thought that accenting this place with a
picture of the <clr:0000>Ancient Columns<clr:ffff> greeting
the <clr:0000>sunrise<clr:ffff> might please our customers.
Though when I went out before dawn to
PAINT said picture...

<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_01>I found myself staring down an
enormous monster!

<sp:3:0:2:0a01>I ducked away and hurried home safely,
<sp:5:0:0>but it's sadly impossible to paint at the
actual location as things are now...
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sigh_01>I can't paint that view from memory, <sp:5:0:0>but if
I even had a <clr:0000>detailed picture of it<clr:ffff>, I'm
sure I could re-create it for our stable.
Com_FirstTime_Only03:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>To celebrate your first time using
Tabantha Bridge Stable and your choice
to <clr:0000>lodge with us<clr:ffff>...
Com_Photo_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM_01>What's that?<sp:5:0:0> Do you have a picture of
the <clr:0000>Ancient Columns in the sunrise<clr:ffff>?
